tab1.text1: We host a Primal Chaos server and PvP, just search for Emerald!

tab2.text1:
Join our Discord server to stay updated on events, announcements, and connect with fellow survivors by the invite link or button below
<TextStyle.Green>https://discord.gg/cvJRX5Sd3p</>

tab3.text1:
PvE Primal Chaos Rules

1. No Building in the Mesh or Ratholes that Require a Chair
2. No Meshed Structures or Turrets
3. No Excessive Spamming
4. No Blocking Caves - building in caves IS allowed, however, blocking access for drops is required
5. ONE Base Location (Due to Islands Lack of Base Locations)
6. No Blocking other Base Locations with Spam
7. No Stacking Dinos
8. No Intentional Lagging of the Server
9. Please Cryo Tames that are NOT Being Used (egg laying dinos are permitted)
10. No Caging
11. No Griefing other Players
12. Names and Dino Names must be English Characters and Reasonable (No Racism etc)
13. No 'Human', '123' Names
14. No obstructing drops unless its at your base or for a boss fight


- Some punishments will be placed on the tribe in game. Others will be placed on the individual player depending on the evidence given.
- Teaming will result in the players caught teaming being banned. Further individual or tribe punishment may also be included.
- Punishments can include warnings, character deletion, dino/structure wipe, temporary ban or permanent ban (including HWID ban).
- False reports will lead to punishment for the reporting player.
